name: 地理學野外調查
restrict: 允許重複修 ◎課程不開放上修
goals: Conducting the analysis of basic geographical data in the field work area, training the data collection, and deepening the basic skills of finding facts.
Conducting field works in the study area, analyzing problems with appropriate geographical concepts, and enhancing advanced ability for solving geographical issues.
syllabus:
1\. Outdoor survey purpose (1st and 2nd week)

2\. Selected research subjects (Weeks 3-4)

3\. Choose Research Area (Weeks 5-6)

4\. References search and collection (Weeks 7-8)

5\. Statistical data operation (Weeks 9-10)

6\. List of materials for the survey (Weeks 11-12)

7\. Replenishing materials (Weeks 13-14)

8\. Discovering problem and analyzing problem (Weeks 15-16)

9\. Telephone visit, interview of elder, and internet search (Weeks 17-18)
prerequisite: The course can be retaken ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
